page.title: 2008 San Diego State Aztecs football team

revisions.rev:
{{NCAATeamSeason |Mode = football |Year = 2008 |Team = San Diego State Aztecs |Image = |ImageSize = |Conference = Mountain West Conference |Division = |ShortConference = MWC |CoachRank = |APRank = |Record = 2â10 |ConfRecord = 1â7 |HeadCoach = [[Chuck Long]] |OffCoach = [[Del Miller]] |DefCoach = [[Bob Elliott (American football)|Bob Elliott]] |OScheme =[[Spread Offense]] |DScheme =[[4-3]] |StadiumArena =[[Qualcomm Stadium]] |Champion = |BowlTourney = |BowlTourneyResult = }} {{2008 Mountain West Conference football standings}} The '''2008 San Diego State Aztecs football team''' will represent [[San Diego State University]] in the 2008 college football season. They are coached by [[Chuck Long]] and play their home games at [[Qualcomm Stadium]], which is also the host of the [[San Diego Chargers]]. The 2008 season is expected to be rough for the Aztecs after losing several key offensive players to the [[NFL]]. The team will look to [[redshirt freshman]] [[quarterback]] [[Ryan Lindley]] to replace star quarterback [[Kevin O'Connell (American football)|Kevin O'Connell]]. The team also lost two of its leading [[wide receivers]] in [[Brett Swain (American football)|Brett Swain]] and [[Chaz Schilens]] along with 4 starting [[offensive linemen]]. == Schedule == {{CFB Schedule Start|rankyear=2008|attend=yes}} {{CFB Schedule Entry | date = August 30 | time = 6:36 pm | w/l = l | nonconf = yes | rank = | opponent = {{cfb link|year=2008|team=Cal Poly Mustangs|school=California Polytechnic State University|title=Cal Poly}} | opprank = | site_stadium = [[Qualcomm Stadium]] | site_cityst = [[San Diego, CA]] | gamename = | tv = [[4SD]] | score = 27-29 | overtime = | attend = 26,851 }} {{CFB Schedule Entry | date = September 6 | time = 3:30 pm | w/l = l | nonconf = yes | away = yes | rank = | opponent = [[2008 Notre Dame Fighting Irish football team|Notre Dame]] | opprank = | site_stadium = [[Notre Dame Stadium]] | site_cityst = [[South Bend, Indiana|South Bend, IN]] | gamename = | tv = [[NBC]] | score = 13-21 | overtime = | attend = 80,795 }} {{CFB Schedule Entry | date = September 13 | time = 6:36 pm | w/l = l | nonconf = yes | away = yes | rank = | opponent = [[2008 San Jose State Spartans football team|San Jose State]] | opprank = | site_stadium = [[Spartan Stadium (San Jose)|Spartan Stadium]] | site_cityst = San Jose, CA | gamename = | tv = | score = 10-35 | overtime = | attend = 17,185 }} {{CFB Schedule Entry | date = September 27 | time = 5:07 pm | w/l = w | nonconf = yes | rank = | opponent = [[2008 Idaho Vandals football team|Idaho]] | opprank = | site_stadium = Qualcomm Stadium | site_cityst = San Diego, CA | gamename = | tv = | score = 45-17 | overtime = | attend = 21,401 }} {{CFB Schedule Entry | date = October 4 | time = 5:00 pm | w/l = l | nonconf = | away = yes | rank = | opponent = [[2008 TCU Horned Frogs football team|TCU]] | opprank = | site_stadium = [[Amon G.
